ValidationRule.description: C25 - if Type of Request = 'Binders Only', then the Binder Color, Binder Cover Option and Binder Template fields must NOT be blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type"), ( (ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Request__c, 'Binders Only')) ), ( (ISPICKVAL(Outside_Color__c, '')) || (ISPICKVAL(Art__c, '')) || (ISPICKVAL(Template__c, '')) ), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HR Essentials"))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Binder Color, Binder Cover Option and Binder Template fields CAN NOT be blank when selecting 'Binders Only' for the Type of Request field.
